ValidationRule.description: MSP subscription start date can not be greater or equal to subscription end date.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( MSP_Contract_Start_Date__c > MSP_Contract_End_Date__c, $RecordType.Name == 'BGA AM', $RecordType.Name == 'BGA AM Short Cycle', NOT(ISBLANK(MSP_Contract_Start_Date__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(MSP_Contract_End_Date__c)) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Contract Start Date cannot be greater than Contract End Date
